data.description:
Horror movies and horror stories have long fascinated people. "VR Horror Stories" leverages virtual reality to place viewers directly in the middle of the action,  enhancing the fear and suspense for a more intense experience.  The collection comprises 17 short 360° horror videos, totaling 46 minutes in duration, each enhanced with immersive and spine-chilling sound effects. Explore dialogue-free scary experiences and English narrative stories with multilingual subtitles support through a user-friendly interface for seamless navigation and enjoyment.

Why "VR Horror Stories"?

1. Love for Horror Movies: People have a longstanding fascination with horror movies. We bring that excitement to a whole new level with VR.

2. Passion for Great Sound:  Spatialized audio enhances the horror experience, making every sound feel like it’s coming from the real world.

3. Curated High-Quality Content: View curated, high-quality 360 videos in one place.

4. Simplified Process: Our app is designed to be intuitive, allowing users to dive into the horror experience without any hassle.

5. Need for Passive Experiences: Experience horror without the need for active participation.

6. Multilingual Subtitles: Chinese, French, German, Hindi, Japanese, and Spanish.

Whether you’re a fan of zombies, demons, or ghosts, we have something that will scare you senseless.

Download our app now and start watching today!

*To enjoy our high-quality VR horror movies, ensure sufficient storage space on your device. 7GB recommended
